amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove credit card transactions from categories of prohibited financial transactions under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 108-145, which removes credit cards from the list of bank instruments banned under the bill. The reasoning for removing credit cards is that the age requirements necessary for obtaining a credit card provide a means of preventing minor'suse of Internet gambling websites.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
